name: Blair MacIntyre's GitHub
tagline: personal, mozilla and georgia tech projects
body:
### Blair MacIntyre's Github Repositories

I have some personal pages here, as well as projects I'm doing professionally, including projects at both Mozilla and Georgia Tech.

Georgia Tech has an enterprise Github server, where we keep most of our work, but I try to keep things I want to share with the world here.  My lab has a set of public repositories at @aelatgt and the Argon Project repositories are at @argonjs.

### Contact
My home webpage is at http://blairmacintyre.me

You may contact me via email at either Mozilla (bmacintyre@mozilla.com) or Georgia Tech (blair@cc.gatech.edu)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
